next_direction: walk over the trees few steps left then head down to the dog
clarification: start by going few steps left, touching the 1st and 2nd treem then go down towards the dog

next_direction: pass the dog from the left side, and head south to the gap between the rocks
clarification: below the dog there is a crab, go there, walking between the 2 rocks

next_direction: once at the crab, keep going west on the water next to the rock and stop before the shark
clarification: after you reached the crab, keep going left on the water until you see the shark

next_direction: go north between the ball and the rock
clarification: go up on the sand now, between the ball and the rock

next_direction: head north on the sand towards the speaker, stop between the tent
clarification: keep going up, slightly diagonally and stop between the speaker and the tent

next_direction: circle from above the tent, then head south to the boat
clarification: first surround the tent by going above it, then left of the tent continue down towards the boat

next_direction: circle the boat from below it then head north to the green grass. try to stay on the sand
clarification: first surround the boat by going below it, then left of the boat continue up towards the green grass

next_direction: keep going north and you are done!
clarification: the final objective is to reach the green bush - you should go up
